title: North and South Korea agree to goal of 'complete denuclearization'
text:
North and South Korea agree to goal of 'complete denuclearization' 12:17pm BST - 01:02
Kim Jong Un and Moon Jae-in agree to work towards a goal of 'complete denuclearization' of the Korean peninsula during a joint statement at their summit meeting. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
Kim Jong Un and Moon Jae-in agree to work towards a goal of 'complete denuclearization' of the Korean peninsula during a joint statement at their summit meeting. Rough cut (no reporter narration). //reut.rs/2KlNCqC
